entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning in the morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
